TopicTitle: How much Electricity does it take to survive the dark side of the Mun?

Articles.Content:
How much Electricity does it take to survive the dark side of the Mun? Enough to be safe. I use TAC life support.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-09T02:42:23Z" title="06/09/2015 02:42  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 9, 2015</time> by OddFunction**

The Mun is tidally locked to Kerbin, and so its day is the same as its orbital period, which is approximately 6d 2.5h. Multiply your electric needs per unit time and there you go. Kerbin days are only 6h long.

Happy landings!

>

Nice thanks.
